jaina:Aluneth.FLAVOR: PHENOMENAL ARCANE POWERâ€¦itty bitty living space.
DESCRIPTIONS: At the start of your turn, draw 3 additional cards. Whenever you shuffle, take #b5 damage.

jaina:ArcaniteCrystal.NAME: Arcanite Crystal
jaina:ArcaniteCrystal.FLAVOR: A natual crystal contains Arcane power, very rare.
DESCRIPTIONS: Whenever you play the first #yArcane card each turn, a random card in your hand costs #b0 that turn.

jaina:ArchmageStuff.NAME: Archmage Stuff
jaina:ArchmageStuff.FLAVOR: The archmage's power is nothing more.
DESCRIPTIONS: At the start of each combat, add #b1 random Common card into your hand.

jaina:AscendantScroll.NAME: Ascendant Scroll
jaina:AscendantScroll.FLAVOR: A scroll containing ancient characters. The use of which can have unpredictable consequences.
DESCRIPTIONS: Right click to use [E] [E] : add #b1 random spell card into your hand. It costs 2 less this turn.

jaina:BookOfWonders.NAME: Book of Wonders
DESCRIPTIONS: At the start of each combat, shuffle #b5 #yScroll #yof #yWonder s into your draw pile.

jaina:RobesOfGaudiness.NAME: Robes of Gaudiness
jaina:RobesOfGaudiness.FLAVOR: A robe embedded lots of ores, which nobody can harness.
DESCRIPTIONS: You cannot play more than 3 cards each turn. Your spell cards cost 0.

jaina:RubySpellstone.NAME: Ruby Spellstone
jaina:RubySpellstone.FLAVOR: The final stone undid its master Spun into wards by nameless caster Azari wailed a savage roar Now sealed in nether, evermore
DESCRIPTIONS: Whenever your play #b3 spell cards of the same kind continuously, gain [E] .

jaina:SphereOfSapience.NAME: Sphere of Sapience
DESCRIPTIONS: Right click to use (Once at each combat): #yScry #b5 , draw #b1 card.

jaina:TheCoin.NAME: The Coin
jaina:TheCoin.FLAVOR: It may not bring good luck, but it can certainly give you a hand!
DESCRIPTIONS: At the start of each combat, add #b1 #yThe #yCoin into your hand.
